title: Event rewards

properties.name: description
properties.value: Event rewards are items in-game that are only available for a limited amount of time and therefore, their numbers are limited. However, most of these items can still be obtained through participating in corresponding holiday events or trading with other players.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Holiday rewardsThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Holiday drops

Event rewards are items in-game that are only available for a limited amount of time and therefore, their numbers are limited. However, most of these items can still be obtained through participating in corresponding holiday events or trading with other players.

These items were initially released in a way similar to the holiday drops in RuneScape's early years; Jagex moderators would give hints as to the location of a discontinued item and only one was available. When it was picked up, another would spawn in its place in a random location.

To ensure that these items will remain available in the future, every time a holiday event is held, the corresponding items will also be available as rewards. For example, during a Halloween event players will be able to obtain pumpkins, Halloween masks and all the other old Halloween rewards.

Contents

  • 1 List of holiday items
    • 1.1 Birthday
    • 1.2 Easter
    • 1.3 Halloween
    • 1.4 Christmas
    • 1.5 Miscellaneous

The table lists all the holiday items and their initial date of availability.

rawContent:
{{External|rs=Holiday rewards|rsc=Holiday drops}} [[File:Blue partyhat chathead.png|left|A blue partyhat, one of the many holiday items.]] '''Event rewards''' are items in-game that are only available for a limited amount of time and therefore, their numbers are limited. However, most of these items can still be obtained through participating in corresponding holiday events or trading with other players. These items were initially released in a way similar to the holiday drops in ''[[RuneScape]]'''s early years; [[Jagex moderator]]s would give hints as to the location of a discontinued item and only one was available. When it was picked up, another would spawn in its place in a random location. To ensure that these items will remain available in the future, every time a holiday event is held, the corresponding items will also be available as rewards. For example, during a [[Halloween event]] players will be able to obtain pumpkins, Halloween masks and all the other old Halloween rewards. ==List of holiday items== The table lists all the holiday items and their initial date of availability. ===Birthday=== {| class="wikitable sortable align-center-1" !class=unsortable|Icon !Name !Release date |- |{{plinkt|War ship}} |2 September 2013 |- |{{plinkt|Cow mask}} |20 February 2014 |- |{{plinkp|Cow top}} {{plinkp|Cow trousers}}
